title: Cam Newton, Lakers, LeBron James, Johnny Manziel, & OBJ
itunes:title: Cam Newton, Lakers, LeBron James, Johnny Manziel, & OBJ
description:
Colin discusses why it's too late for Carolina Panthers QB Cam Newton to improve, Las Vegas odds on the Las Angeles Lakers next season, President Donald Trump's comments about LeBron James, Johnny Manziel's first game in the CFL, and why New York Giants WR Odell Beckham Jr. isn't getting the contract he desires. Guests includes DeAngelo Hall, Greg Jennings, and Tony Gonzalez.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
